com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.location

Interface IZatLciService


  • public interface IZatLciService
    Interface for calling the LCI service.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void requestLciCandidates(IZatLciResponseListener listener)
      Request for LCI candidates.
      void sendUserLciSelection(Context ctx, java.lang.String lci)
      Send user LCI selection to LCI service.
      void unregisterListener(IZatLciResponseListener listener)
      Unregister the listener of LCI candidates.

    • Method Detail

      • requestLciCandidates

        void requestLciCandidates(IZatLciResponseListener listener)
                          throws IZatIllegalArgumentException
        Request for LCI candidates. listener will be called immediately after the call returns, and called repeatedly upon candidates updates.
        Parameters:
        listener - A IZatLciResponseListener for receiving LCI candidates.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException
        IZatIllegalArgumentException

      • sendUserLciSelection

        void sendUserLciSelection(Context ctx,
                        java.lang.String lci)
                          throws IZatIllegalArgumentException
        Send user LCI selection to LCI service. When the argument is null, the call requests to switch LCI selection mode to Auto.
        Parameters:
        ctx - Application context of caller (reserved for future use).
        lci - user LCI selection or null.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException
        IZatIllegalArgumentException

      • unregisterListener

        void unregisterListener(IZatLciResponseListener listener)
                        throws IZatIllegalArgumentException
        Unregister the listener of LCI candidates.
        Parameters:
        listener - A IZatLciResponseListener for receiving LCI candidates.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException
        IZatIllegalArgumentException
